Language.Sentence: The Form color picker type produces an object that allows user to select the color using the color picker. It can be contained only in the Form and Password objects.
Order of rendering the object on the page
Spacing between the top edge of the container and the object
Spacing between the left edge of the container and the object
Index number of switching the elements on pressing the tab key
Define if the text field is hidden or not
The CSS style of the object. If the user changes CSS style, the Skin attribute is changed to the "User defined".

The visual appearance of the object. If you select any skin, the CSS is copied to the Style attribute, so if you want to switch skin back to the User defined, you will have to delete everything from the Style attribute.
Position in visual hierarchy of objects
Incorrect value, must be even integer from 0 to 99

Incorrect value, must be a number with units or 'auto
Incorrect value, must be even positive integer
Incorrect value, must be either 0 or 1
Incorrect value, must be either 0 or 1
Incorrect value, must be even integer from 0 to 99
Incorrect value, must be either 0 or 1

Fade effect, time is indicated in milliseconds
